name: Glueless Pure Virgin Silkbase Wigs
description:
Our Brazilian Glueless Pure Virgin Silkbase Wigs are made to be worn without applying any adhesive. The Silkbase Wig is secured with clips and straps. 130% density! 

Select cap size and lace color below!!

FOR CUSTOM ORDERS, PLEASE SELECT EXTENSION COLOR FROM COLOR CHART!!!

For custom Silkbase Wig order please email us at mane.impressions@yahoo.com

name: Color Chart
description:
Select your custom color for your desired Extensions. 

Virgin Hair Weft only available in Natural Light Brown and  Dark Brown

name: Mongolian Kinky Curly
description:
This hair resembles African American unrelaxed hair. 

Mongolian Kinky Curly is steam processed

This hair is measured pulled straight.

FOR CUSTOM ORDERS, PLEASE SELECT EXTENSION COLOR FROM COLOR CHART!!!

name: Pure Virgin Brazilian 8 Piece Clip-in Extensions
description:
Extensions are an easy way to add volume and length to your hair. Just place them in and go!

Brazilian hair is one of the most desirable extensions we offer. This hair is imported from Brazil. The hair is soft and full of volume. All ethnicities can wear this hair, but it is best suitable for more textured hair. The texture comes in straight and body wave. 

FOR CUSTOM ORDERS, PLEASE SELECT EXTENSION COLOR FROM COLOR CHART!!!

Don't forget to check out our Mink Fur Lashes, Loop Brushes, and U-Part Wig Cap!!!

Please email mane.impressions@yahoo.com for custom orders.

name: Pure Virgin Brazilian I-Tip Keratin 200 Strands
description:
I-tip strands offer a seamless installation. These strands can be installed using micro links and keratin infusion.

This hair is imported from Brazil. This hair resembles African American relaxed hair. This hair has tons of volume and is a bit thicker than Indian hair. 

The texture comes in straight and body wave.

name: Pure Virgin Brazilian Tape Extensions 20 Piece Set
description:
Tape Extensions are a seamless application applied with double-sided tape. The extensions can be worn up to 8 weeks, then re-installed.

Brazilian hair is one of the most desirable extensions we offer. This hair is imported from Brazil. The hair is soft and full of volume. All ethnicities can wear this hair, but it is best suitable for more textured hair.

 The texture comes in straight and body wave.

name: Brazilian Silkbase Closure and Frontals
description:
This beautiful 4*4 silk base Brazilian Closure is great for sew-ins. The closure provides you with a natural hairline and scalp.

Textures available are straight, deep wave, natural wave, and curly.
